ygData.subject: Re: New Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks.  Got the skull during lunch, so the only parts left now are the patch of shadow and the chipped mask.  Might I ask where the goblin headmaster is in
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks. Got the skull during lunch, so the only parts left now are the
patch of shadow and the chipped mask. Might I ask where the goblin
headmaster is in OOT, as it's a rather large zone.

-Shadowwalker

> I have the mask.
>
> You need to kill Greater DB. DB does not drop the skull, only GDB does.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Shadowwalker [mailto:Shadowwalker@...]
> Sent: Thursday, October 21, 1999 7:23 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] New Quests
>
>
> I just had a question. I have been working on the new quests (Acumen's
Mask
> at the moment) and I have killed about 15 darkbone skeletons and 1 greater
> darkbone skeleton and still have not seen a darkbone skull. Has anyone
else
> gotten this loot item yet, and if so, do I just need to keep killing more
> darkbones, more greater darkbones, or something special?
>
> -Shadowwalker
>
>
>
